thread.title: Test your ‘fear threshold’ with 'Paranormal Activity' at Town Square
thread.title_full: Test your ‘fear threshold’ with 'Paranormal Activity' at Town Square | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Christopher Lawrence
title: Test your ‘fear threshold’ with 'Paranormal Activity' at Town Square
text:
Sure, you may think you can handle scary movies. This weekend, you can find out for sure.
The free "Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension" Fear Lab will be at Town Square from 11 a.m. to 9 p.m. Sunday to test your "fear threshold."
Participants will be strapped down and shown 3-D footage from "The Ghost Dimension" while having their vital signs measured. They'll also receive a photo of themselves being terrified.
"Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension" is being billed as the conclusion to the franchise. It opens Oct. 23.
Contact Christopher Lawrence at clawrence@reviewjournal.com . On Twitter: @life_onthecouch .
It’s starting to feel like...
